definition: surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Fat A triglyceride of a long-chain carboxylic acid that is solid below 20℃.
sentences.chinese: 一種長鏈羧酸的甘油三酯，20℃以下爲固態。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the relationship between exercise and intramyocellular triacylglycerol.
sentences.chinese: 就運動與肌內甘油三酯的關係進行綜述。

sentences.english: Activate the lipoprotein supersession enzyme kind , promote glycerin three esters hydrolyzation.
sentences.chinese: 激活脂蛋白代謝酶類，促進甘油三酯的水解。

sentences.english: The metabolism of triglyceride-rich lipoproteins and HDL is closely linked.
sentences.chinese: 富含甘油三酯的脂蛋白的代謝與HDL密切相關。

sentences.english: The study pinpoints triglycerides as the critical indicator.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究將甘油三酯做爲關鍵性指標。

sentences.english: Weight Loss Decreases Excess Pancreatic Triacylglycerol Specifically in Type 2 Diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 減肥降低具體2型糖尿病胰腺甘油三酯過剩。

sentences.english: Is triglyceride high cholesterol high what reason is caused?
sentences.chinese: 甘油三酯高膽固醇高是什麼原因引起的？

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
